I want to create a servlet in a utility project that will turn into a jar in a web app's WEB-INF/lib directory. I tried using the new servlet wizard, but was not successful.

1. The project drop-down was empty. Presumably its filtered to only include web projects. I think this should be relaxed to include utility projects. Clearly cannot update the descriptor in that case, but it should at least be possible to create the servlet class.

2. I then clicked the "Browse" button next to the Folder field and got the following exception in the error log. It looks like some controls ought to be disabled when no project is selected.
